oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Commission of Fifth Sergeant Lawrence Hartigan, Co. C, 30th New York State Volunteers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a pre Civil War commission for the New York State troops. Hartigan was an Irish immigrant who arrived in the United States as an infant. When the war began the 30th New York was absorbed into other units. Hartigan served only briefly after the war started.
